entities.name: aunt marge
entities.description: Aunt Marge is described as being loud and affectionate towards Dudley. She is also mentioned to be holding a suitcase.

entities.name: dudders
entities.description: Dudders is mentioned by Aunt Marge as her missing pet.

entities.name: neffy-poo
entities.description: Neffy-poo is also mentioned by Aunt Marge as her missing pet.

entities.name: dudley
entities.description: Dudley is described as being fat and having a bow tie visible under his chins. He is also mentioned to be receiving payment from Aunt Marge for tolerating her hugs.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as being knocked by the suitcase thrown by Aunt Marge and is treated like a hat stand by her.

relationships.description: Aunt Marge is described as being concerned about the whereabouts of Dudders.
Aunt Marge is also described as being concerned about the whereabouts of Neffy-poo.
Dudley is mentioned to be tolerating Aunt Marge's hugs in exchange for payment.
